segment.source: Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V
segment.target: Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V

segment.source: Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V
segment.target: Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V

segment.source: Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V
segment.target: Planning for Migrating from a Previous Version of App-V

segment.source: Use the following information to plan how to migrate to App-V 5.0 from previous versions of App-V.
segment.target: Use the following information to plan how to migrate to App-V 5.0 from previous versions of App-V.

segment.source: Migration requirements
segment.target: Migration requirements

segment.source: Before you start any upgrades, review the following requirements:
segment.target: Before you start any upgrades, review the following requirements:

segment.source: If you are upgrading from a version earlier than App-V 4.6 SP2, upgrade to version App-V 4.6 SP3 first before upgrading to App-V 5.0 or later.
segment.target: If you are upgrading from a version earlier than App-V 4.6 SP2, upgrade to version App-V 4.6 SP3 first before upgrading to App-V 5.0 or later.

segment.source: In this scenario, upgrade the App-V clients first, and then upgrade the server components.
segment.target: In this scenario, upgrade the App-V clients first, and then upgrade the server components.

segment.source: Note: App-V 4.6 has exited Mainstream support.
segment.target: Note: App-V 4.6 has exited Mainstream support.

segment.source: App-V 5.0 supports only packages that are created using App-V 5.0, or packages that have been converted to the App-V 5.0 (.appv) format.
segment.target: App-V 5.0 supports only packages that are created using App-V 5.0, or packages that have been converted to the App-V 5.0 (.appv) format.

segment.source: App-V 5.0 SP3 only: If you are upgrading the App-V Server from App-V 5.0 SP1, see About App-V 5.0 SP3 for instructions.
segment.target: App-V 5.0 SP3 only: If you are upgrading the App-V Server from App-V 5.0 SP1, see About App-V 5.0 SP3 for instructions.

segment.source: Running the App-V 5.0 client concurrently with App-V 4.6
segment.target: Running the App-V 5.0 client concurrently with App-V 4.6

segment.source: You can run the App-V 5.0 client concurrently on the same computer with the App-V 4.6 SP3 client.
segment.target: You can run the App-V 5.0 client concurrently on the same computer with the App-V 4.6 SP3 client.

segment.source: When you run coexisting App-V clients, you can:
segment.target: When you run coexisting App-V clients, you can:

segment.source: Convert an App-V 4.6 SP3 package to the App-V 5.0 format and publish both packages, when you have both clients running.
segment.target: Convert an App-V 4.6 SP3 package to the App-V 5.0 format and publish both packages, when you have both clients running.

segment.source: Define the migration policy for the converted package, which allows the converted App-V 5.0 package to assume the file type associations and shortcuts from the App-V 4.6 package.
segment.target: Define the migration policy for the converted package, which allows the converted App-V 5.0 package to assume the file type associations and shortcuts from the App-V 4.6 package.

segment.source: Supported coexistence scenarios
segment.target: Supported coexistence scenarios

segment.source: The following table shows the supported App-V coexistence scenarios.
segment.target: The following table shows the supported App-V coexistence scenarios.

segment.source: We recommend that you install the latest available updates of a given release when you are running coexisting clients.
segment.target: We recommend that you install the latest available updates of a given release when you are running coexisting clients.

segment.source: Requirements for running coexisting clients
segment.target: Requirements for running coexisting clients

segment.source: To run coexisting clients, you must:
segment.target: To run coexisting clients, you must:

segment.source: Install the App-V 4.6 client before you install the App-V 5.0 client.
segment.target: Install the App-V 4.6 client before you install the App-V 5.0 client.

segment.source: Enable the Enable Migration Mode Group Policy setting, which is in the App-VClient Coexistence node.
segment.target: Enable the Enable Migration Mode Group Policy setting, which is in the App-VClient Coexistence node.

segment.source: To get the deploy the .admx template, see How to Download and Deploy MDOP Group Policy (.admx) Templates.
segment.target: To get the deploy the .admx template, see How to Download and Deploy MDOP Group Policy (.admx) Templates.

segment.target: Client downloads and documentation

segment.target: The following table provides link to the TechNet documentation about the releases.

segment.source: The TechNet documentation about the App-V client applies to both clients, unless stated otherwise.
segment.target: The TechNet documentation about the App-V client applies to both clients, unless stated otherwise.

segment.source: App-V 5.0 Coexistence and Migration
segment.target: App-V 5.0 Coexistence and Migration

segment.source: Converting “previous-version” packages using the package converter
segment.target: Converting “previous-version” packages using the package converter

segment.source: Before migrating a package, created using App-V 4.6 SP3 or earlier, to App-V 5.0, review the following requirements:
segment.target: Before migrating a package, created using App-V 4.6 SP3 or earlier, to App-V 5.0, review the following requirements:

segment.source: You must convert the package to the .appv file format.
segment.target: You must convert the package to the .appv file format.

segment.source: The Package Converter supports only the direct conversion of packages that were created by using App-V 4.5 and later.
segment.target: The Package Converter supports only the direct conversion of packages that were created by using App-V 4.5 and later.

segment.source: To use the package converter on a package that was created using a previous version, you must use an App-V 4.5 or later version of the sequencer to upgrade the package, and then you can perform the package conversion.
segment.target: To use the package converter on a package that was created using a previous version, you must use an App-V 4.5 or later version of the sequencer to upgrade the package, and then you can perform the package conversion.

segment.source: For more information about using the package converter to convert a package, see How to Convert a Package Created in a Previous Version of App-V.
segment.target: For more information about using the package converter to convert a package, see How to Convert a Package Created in a Previous Version of App-V.

segment.source: After you convert the file, you can deploy it to target computers that run the App-V 5.0 client.
segment.target: After you convert the file, you can deploy it to target computers that run the App-V 5.0 client.
